title: Has anyone else's Google pixel been experiencing severe crashes today (starting March 22, 2012)?
content: Starting 3-22-2021, my Google pixel starting experiencing severe crashing issues. 75% of my applications crash upon launch, I cannot access my Google search bar, and so forth... The issue appeared out of nowhere and I'm not sure how to fix it. I attempted to rebooting my phone a number of times and that did not work.
